# objc_duplicateClass(_:_:_:)

**Function**

Used by Foundation’s Key-Value Observing.

## Declaration

```swift
func objc_duplicateClass(_ original: AnyClass, _ name: UnsafePointer<CChar>, _ extraBytes: Int) -> AnyClass
```

## Discussion

Do not call this function yourself.

## Adding Classes

- **objc_allocateClassPair(_:_:_:)**: Creates a new class and metaclass.
- **objc_disposeClassPair(_:)**: Destroys a class and its associated metaclass.
- **objc_registerClassPair(_:)**: Registers a class that was allocated using [doc://com.apple.objectivec/documentation/ObjectiveC/objc_allocateClassPair(_:_:_:)].
